description: "Plan of improvements made to the pier at the port in Batavia (Jakarta): red lines show new parts added in 1822; numbers record the change in water depth (red is 1818; black is 1822). Planned future works and the ‘Waterkasteel’ fort are also shown."
title: "Schets der verrigte werkzaamheden aan de zee hoofden op de bank voor de Groote rivier te Batavia"
